snippet: An investigation into the campaign finances of Speaker Christopher Donovan will not keep him from running for Congress or force him to resign, his campaign said.
abstract: Campaign manager for Connecticut House Speaker Christopher Donovan says that investigation into Dodd's campaign finances will not keep him from running for Congress, nor force him to resign.
lead_paragraph: An investigation into the campaign finances of Speaker Christopher Donovan will not keep him from running for Congress or force him to resign, his campaign said.

headline.seo: Connecticut House Speaker, Christopher Donovan, Faces Scrutiny on Campaign Finances
headline.print_headline: House Leader In Hartford Is Scrutinized
